titles: A sermon against clipping, preach'd before the Right Honourable the Lord Mayor and court of aldermen, at Guild-Hall Chappel, on Decemb. 16. 1694 by W. Fleetwood.
author: Fleetwood, William, 1656-1723.
publisher: Printed by T. Hodgkin, and are to be sold by J. Whitlock,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
